charges.charge_description: 21:846 Conspiracy to Possess with Intent to Distribute Oxycodone(1)

charges.charge_disposition: The Court orders the defendant committed to the custody of the Buruea of Prisons for a term of 84 months. Upon release, the defendant is placed on supervised release for a term of 2 years with special conditions. The defendant is to forfeit currency in the amount of $153,328.00. The Court further imposes a special assessment of $300

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) Distribution of Oxycodone; 18:2 Aiding and Abetting(2-3)

charges.charge_disposition: The Court orders the defendant committed to the custody of the Buruea of Prisons for a term of 84 months. Upon release, the defendant is placed on supervised release for a term of 2 years with special conditions. The defendant is to forfeit currency in the amount of $153,328.00. The Court further imposes a special assessment of $300

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and 846 Conspire to distribute oxycodone and distribute oxycodone
21:846 Conspiracy to Possess with Intent to Distribute Oxycodone(1)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is committed to the custody of the BOP for 41 months to be followed by a period of Supervised Release with Special Conditions of 2 years. No Fine. Special Assessment of $200. The sentence is STAYED until 5/2/11.
